modName: Civil War completed Only Save Game (Imperial Victory)

[color=#ffffff][size=4]About the character:
Name: Caesar.
Race: Imperial.
Gender: Male.
Level: 8



NO perks were used.



Location: Solitude ,Castle Dour,Emperor's tower.
Time: Tirdas, 10:27 AM, 2and of Hearthfire, 4E 201.



Only the imperial legion quest line is finished nothing more.


NO mods are required.


Enjoy and Endorse if you like.
